example.text: Last Congress, Democrats made sure the American Rescue Plan had funding to prevent fraud and modernize unemployment insurance (UI) systems. The House GOP’s Surprise Billing Our Workers Act will increase UI fraud, put undue financial burden on Americans, and cut American jobs.

I am committed to working with the Biden-Harris Administration, Congressional Democrats, and whenever possible, our colleagues across the aisle to implement policies that help our workers and families Make It In America. I was honored to have Maryland Speaker of the House Adrienne Jones join me as my guest.

I was proud to help enact the #PACTAct last August, which provides our veterans with the lifesaving care they need. Through the #PACTAct, post-9/11 Veterans are currently eligible for special health care enrollment—learn more here: [[url]]
Last night, we turned the tables on the press and got to ask [[user]] Congress reporters some hard-hitting questions – we got some mealy-mouthed answers from them, but they kept it fun! [[url]]

I was proud to help enact the #PACTAct last August, which provides our veterans with the lifesaving care they need. Through the #PACTAct, post-9/11 Veterans are currently eligible for special health care enrollment—learn more here: [[url]]

At the same time, however, we must prepare to return to Washington and see to it that we are just as productive in this final month as we have been throughout the 117th Congress. Whether it's strengthening our economy, improving our immigration system, protecting our national security, or safeguarding democracy around the world, we have important work ahead of us in December.

I was proud to help enact the #PACTAct last August, which provides our veterans with the lifesaving care they need. Through the #PACTAct, post-9/11 Veterans are currently eligible for special health care enrollment—learn more here: [[url]]
